attributes.action: Stop the goverment from cutting more from disabled benefits
attributes.additional_details: PIP is designed to help with the extra costs of being disabled, and the government cutting eligibility will not make these costs magically disappear - it will just make it even harder for them to live. The government claims that these have been put into place to increase the incentive to work - they just remember that many disabled people wish they could work, but cannot due to inaccessibility and ableism - cutting support will not change this, only helping us more will
attributes.background: The government needs to change their plans to cut disability benefits. Instead of supporting disabled people they have decided to use outdated ableist views to penalise us - none of us choose to be on benefits out of work, we are due to our health. This will not change at all by cutting support

rejection.details:
